ThingDef.label: ACOG
ThingDef.description: Specialist sight which allows for moderate amount of zoom. Highly effective on medium distance encounters.

ThingDef.label: Dot Sight
ThingDef.description: Classic dot sight which dramatically improves aiming performance on a lot of weapons.

ThingDef.label: Scope(x8-16)
ThingDef.description: A scope with high zoom. Effective on single shot weapons.

ThingDef.label: Night-vision Scope
ThingDef.description: Scope with moderate amount of zoom but comes with night-vision which reduces penalty when shooting in the dark.

ThingDef.label: Skeleton Stock
ThingDef.description: Cheap, light-weight stock thanks to it skeleton structure.

ThingDef.label: Composite Grip
ThingDef.description: Rubber handle which can be easily attached under most guns. Useful for controlling recoil.

ThingDef.label: Angled Grip
ThingDef.description: Rubber handle which can be easily attached under most guns. Its form allows for moderate recoil control and improved aiming times.

ThingDef.label: Shotgun Magazine
ThingDef.description: Extension to the tube which holds bullets for shotguns. Although it makes weapon heavier, it does reduce cooldown time.

ThingDef.label: Specialist reloader
ThingDef.description: Well made composite attachment for magazine which allows for quick reload times.

ThingDef.label: Nozzle
ThingDef.description: A nozzle crafted using well mantained spare parts and specialist equipment. It works through redirecting gas of the outgoing bullet.

ThingDef.label: Silencer
ThingDef.description: A silencer which muffles the shots what allows for safer hunting at the expense of damage.

ThingDef.label: Bolt-action Handle
ThingDef.description: Well crafted handle which improves reload times on bolt-action weapons.
